Tigerhawk: ::Looks at her:: You can never be ready for a Full on scale pred 
attack for there are no rules in combat with them you just grit your teeth 
and hope you do your best and that's all Liono will ask of you. You got a lot 
to learn Kid. ::Starts to type on the computer:: The Preds are getting 
restless and that's a sign for combat.  There's your first lesson. ::shifts 
power to Defense shields:: Liono the preds are active.

Liono: ::Comlink:: All maximals back to Base A.S.A.P. things are getting ugly 
and i promise if we win this battle we have a victory party and a day of rest 
::starts placing holocubes every where:: First things first ::draws Phoenixes 
sword:: Return you propose has been severed go await the next hero who needs 
you to stop addrax

Phoenix's sword: Wrong you still need me ::Goes into the lions Claw::

Liono: Your choice nice to have you old man. Well, I guess this is it. I'll 
handle the first wave of attackers.
